pages.text: Is it really dragons these giant remains come from?$(br)You don't know, honestly. But judging by the size, it could very well be! Even now, these blocks are surrounded by a magical aura, protecting it from blatant destruction. Still, you had a blast just running your fingers over their rough surface.

Damaging Dragonbone using $(thing)Explosions$() seems to breeze away most of the magical protective aura, making you able to finally mine it.$(br)The dropped pieces still retained some of that ancient, magical aura.
